artist: Engraver: Bernard Picart; Artist: Jean de la Haye
description: Portrait of Louis XIV; bust length turned left and looking front; wearing armor with a sash; in an oval on a plinth
inscription:
Signature, Date, Title, and Inscription

in plate upper right in black: Tom: II. Pag: 424. | on plinth in black: B. Picart sculp. dir. /  LODEWYK DE VEERTIENDE / KONINK VAN VRANKRYK &c. |  on sheet in pencil: 2-199
title: Portrait of King Louis XIV
